span.p:
db1.kdbx
Password: password123
contains
Machine-generated Password

span.p:
After transfer run 'wipe'
HDD: wipe residuals
SSD: Use encrypted drive/container for files. may also try LUKS

display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Physical Security OPSEC
Measures: Barriers, surveillance, access control
Can Include Firearms: Yes, if justified

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Chemical Security
Measures: Safe handling/storage
Can Include Chemicals: Not typically for defense

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Encrypted USB
Encryption: Yes
Anonymity: *No
Internet: No
Use: Offline transfers

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
OnionShare
Encryption: Yes Tor
Anonymity: Yes
Internet: Yes
Use: Anonymous sharing

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Taildrop
Encryption: Yes
Anonymity: No
Internet: Yes
Use: Personal device sync

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Persistent Storage
Encryption: Yes
Anonymity: N/A
Internet: No
Use: Secure local storage

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
